message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $115. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a deal at this price.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $110. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product. Let's make this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $105 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to go down to $110 one more time. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still thinking $105 is a fair price. Can you meet me at this price?
